name: Sakura Spring
description:
Controls (Default is touch - made for mobile use)

Touch left or right of Giesha and she will move towards area touched

Touch above or below will either put her umbrella up or down.

Umbrella blocks hazards (Fish and fire balls) and also pickups (Luck tokens and lives).

Return key will toggle between touch and keyboard mode (An audio cue will play when you enter keyboard mode)

ASWD or Arrow keys/Space will handle movement and umbrella
